languages.text: {n}В холодном взгляде загорается садистический огонек.{/n} "Разумеется, и длятся достаточно времени, чтобы дать черни пищу для размышлений о своих прегрешениях! При этом свидетели казни обязательно одного сословия с преступником — неразумно убивать офицера на глазах сброда, ведь это подрывает чувство ранга!" {n}Иокаста умолкает с трудом — похоже, ей редко удается обсудить с кем-то нюансы столь сложного и тонкого ремесла, как показательные экзекуции.{/n}

{n}Sauerback's eyes gleam with a sadistic light.{/n} "Naturally, they last long enough to give the rabble something to think about! The witnesses to the execution must be of the same class as the criminal. It is unwise to put an officer to death in front of the common folk, for it undermines the perception of rank!" {n}She trails off. It seems like she rarely gets to discuss the nuances of a craft as complex and delicate as capital punishments.{/n}

При этом свидетели казни обязательно одного сословия с преступником — неразумно убивать офицера на глазах сброда, ведь это подрывает чувство ранга!" {n}Иокаста умолкает с трудом — похоже, ей редко удается обсудить с кем-то нюансы столь сложного и тонкого ремесла, как показательные экзекуции.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jocasta's eyes gleam with a sadistic light.{/n} "Naturally, they last long enough to give the rabble something to think about! The witnesses to the execution must be of the same class as the criminal, it is unwise to put an officer to death in front of the common folk, for it undermines the perception of rank!" {n}Jocasta trails off. It looks like she rarely gets to discuss the nuances of a craft as complex and delicate as capital punishments.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une lueur sadique vient illuminer les yeux de Jocasta.{/n} « Naturellement. Et nous faisons en sorte de faire durer le plaisir, pour donner à la populace de quoi réfléchir ! Les témoins de l'exécution doivent être issus de la même classe que le criminel. Il ne serait guère judicieux de mettre à mort un officier devant les gens du commun, cela risquerait de nuire à leur perception de la hiérarchie ! » {n}Elle s'interrompt. Il semble qu'elle ait rarement l'occasion de discuter des nuances de l'art complexe et délicat des exécutions publiques.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback's eyes gleam with a sadistic light.{/n} "Naturally, they last long enough to give the rabble something to think about! The witnesses to the execution must be of the same class as the criminal. It seems like she rarely gets to discuss the nuances of a craft as complex and delicate as capital punishments.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une lueur sadique vient illuminer les yeux de Jocasta.{/n} « Naturellement. Et nous faisons en sorte de faire durer le plaisir, pour donner à la populace de quoi réfléchir ! Les témoins de l'exécution doivent être issus de la même classe que le criminel. Il ne serait guère judicieux de mettre à mort un officier devant les gens du commun, cela risquerait de nuire à leur perception de la hiérarchie ! » {n}Elle s'interrompt. Il semble qu'elle ait rarement l'occasion de discuter des nuances de l'art complexe et délicat des exécutions publiques.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los ojos de Sauerback muestran un brillo sádico.{/n} «¡Naturalmente, duran lo suficiente para que la turba reflexione sobre sus actos! Los testigos de la ejecución deben pertenecer a la misma clase que el criminal. ¡No es sensato ejecutar a un oficial frente al populacho, ya que eso socava la percepción de su rango!». {n}Su voz se va apagando. Parece que no suele tener ocasión de hablar sobre los pormenores de un arte tan complejo y delicado como el de la pena capital.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback's eyes gleam with a sadistic light.{/n} "Naturally, they last long enough to give the rabble something to think about! The witnesses to the execution must be of the same class as the criminal. It is unwise to put an officer to death in front of the common folk, for it undermines the perception of rank!" {n}She trails off. It seems like she rarely gets to discuss the nuances of a craft as complex and delicate as capital punishments.{/n}

Los testigos de la ejecución deben pertenecer a la misma clase que el criminal. ¡No es sensato ejecutar a un oficial frente al populacho, ya que eso socava la percepción de su rango!». {n}Su voz se va apagando. Parece que no suele tener ocasión de hablar sobre los pormenores de un arte tan complejo y delicado como el de la pena capital.{/n}

languages.text: {n}苏尔贝克的双眼中闪烁着充满施虐意味的光芒。{/n}“这是自然，处刑的过程会持续很久，好让那些乌合之众充分思考！围观死刑的人，必须和罪犯处于同一阶级。若是在普通船员面前处死军官，那就太不明智了，因为这种做法破坏了阶级观念！”{n}她的声音慢慢变轻了，听起来，她很少有机会讨论死刑这种复杂而微妙的技艺。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback's eyes gleam with a sadistic light.{/n} "Naturally, they last long enough to give the rabble something to think about! The witnesses to the execution must be of the same class as the criminal. It is unwise to put an officer to death in front of the common folk, for it undermines the perception of rank!" {n}She trails off. It seems like she rarely gets to discuss the nuances of a craft as complex and delicate as capital punishments.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}苏尔贝克的双眼中闪烁着充满施虐意味的光芒。{/n}“这是自然，处刑的过程会持续很久，好让那些乌合之众充分思考！围观死刑的人，必须和罪犯处于同一阶级。若是在普通船员面前处死军官，那就太不明智了，因为这种做法破坏了阶级观念！”{n}她的声音慢慢变轻了，听起来，她很少有机会讨论死刑这种复杂而微妙的技艺。{/n}

languages.text: {n}ザウアーバックの目が、冷酷な光を放った。{/n}「当然ながら、狂信者たちに何かを考えさせるには十分だ！死刑執行の立会人は、犯人と同じ階級の者であるべきだ。士官を庶民の前で死刑にするわけにはいかない。階級の大切さを失ってしまからな！」 {n}彼女は言葉を濁した。死刑のように複雑で繊細な技術について話る機会など、あまりないようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback's eyes gleam with a sadistic light.{/n} "Naturally, they last long enough to give the rabble something to think about! The witnesses to the execution must be of the same class as the criminal. It is unwise to put an officer to death in front of the common folk, for it undermines the perception of rank!" {n}She trails off. It seems like she rarely gets to discuss the nuances of a craft as complex and delicate as capital punishments.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ザウアーバックの目が、冷酷な光を放った。{/n}「当然ながら、狂信者たちに何かを考えさせるには十分だ！死刑執行の立会人は、犯人と同じ階級の者であるべきだ。士官を庶民の前で死刑にするわけにはいかない。階級の大切さを失ってしまからな！」 {n}彼女は言葉を濁した。死刑のように複雑で繊細な技術について話る機会など、あまりないようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}In Sauerbacks Augen funkelt ein sadistisches Licht.{/n} "Natürlich halten sie lange genug durch, um den Pöbel ein wenig zum Nachdenken anzuregen! Die Zeugen der Hinrichtung müssen aus derselben Klasse stammen wie der Verbrecher. Es ist unklug, einen Offizier vor dem Pöbel hinzurichten, denn das untergräbt die Wahrnehmung der Rangordnung!" {n}Sie verstummt. Offenbar bekommt sie nur selten Gelegenheit, über die Feinheiten einer so komplexen und delikaten Kunst wie der richtigen Ausführung der Todesstrafe zu sprechen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback's eyes gleam with a sadistic light.{/n} "Naturally, they last long enough to give the rabble something to think about! The witnesses to the execution must be of the same class as the criminal. It is unwise to put an officer to death in front of the common folk, for it undermines the perception of rank!" {n}She trails off. It seems like she rarely gets to discuss the nuances of a craft as complex and delicate as capital punishments.{/n}

Die Zeugen der Hinrichtung müssen aus derselben Klasse stammen wie der Verbrecher. Es ist unklug, einen Offizier vor dem Pöbel hinzurichten, denn das untergräbt die Wahrnehmung der Rangordnung!" {n}Sie verstummt. Offenbar bekommt sie nur selten Gelegenheit, über die Feinheiten einer so komplexen und delikaten Kunst wie der richtigen Ausführung der Todesstrafe zu sprechen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sauerback'in gözleri, sadist bir ışıkla parıldıyor.{/n} "Doğal olarak ayaktakımına düşünmeleri için bir şeyler verecek şekilde uzun süre hayatta tutuldular! İdama şahit olanlar, suçluyla aynı sınıftan olmalıdır. Bir subayın ölümünü sıradan halkın önünde gerçekleştirmek akıllıca olmaz, rütbe algılarını bozar!" {n}Konudan sapıyor. İdam cezası gibi kompleks ve hassas bir zanaatın nüansları üzerine konuşma şansını fazla bulamıyor olsa gerek.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback's eyes gleam with a sadistic light.{/n} "Naturally, they last long enough to give the rabble something to think about! The witnesses to the execution must be of the same class as the criminal. It is unwise to put an officer to death in front of the common folk, for it undermines the perception of rank!" {n}She trails off. It seems like she rarely gets to discuss the nuances of a craft as complex and delicate as capital punishments.{/n}
